events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery mentioned by the customer.
Assigning the case to the Refund Support Team to handle the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like to request a refund due to receiving the wrong product.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the product, which is not what I ordered.
We have verified your order details and photo. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and refund solution. I appreciate the help resolving this issue.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited back shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As the refund was completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
